testsuite.name: Scenario: client makes call to GET /version

testcase.name: When the client calls /version
testcase.classname: Scenario: client makes call to GET /version

failure.message: org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException: I/O error on GET request for "http://localhost:8080/version": Connection refused: connect; nested exception is java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
